question: Oliver was a pen pal with 13 people. He stopped being penpals with 2 of them. They each send 3 letters a week that are 6 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 10 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Oliver is penpals with 13-2=<<13-2=11>>11 people
Thus he gets 11*3=<<11*3=33>>33 letters a week
So he writes 33*6=<<33*6=198>>198 pages a week
So he writes for 198*10=<<198*10=1980>>1980 minutes a week
So he writes 1980/60=<<1980/60=33>>33 hours a week
#### 33
